short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes text descriptions from subtitles while watching netflix. Anything inside square brackets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove subtitle text for the visually impaired on Netflix, this is any text between square brackets such as [inaudible dialogue] or song lyrics. Removes punctuation at the end of sentences
